actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in public buildings.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that nothing contained in the Constitution shall abridge the right of persons lawfully assembled in any public building which is supported in whole or in part through the expenditure of public funds to participate in non-denominational prayer.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in public buildings.
